title: 'Hot Fuzz' recruitment video scrapped by Guernsey Police
title_page: 'Hot Fuzz' recruitment video scrapped by Guernsey Police - BBC News
maintext: While there were some positive comments on the Facebook post, many viewers were concerned with the way the video portrayed islanders as "violent raging lunatics", while others found the tone "glorified firearms" and was "not a good look from law enforcement".
